review: Love this thing! Exceeded my expectations! I recommend to anyone who likes have easy access to movies and shows. This thing streams anything and everything I throw at it.
author: Ruben Guanajuato

review: It's the best product ever! Economical and diverse. Get it b4 anything else.
author: Dwight

review: bought this as a gift for my parents and they love it easy to use.
author: merle skeet

review: Only thing is missing is getting on come or goggle
author: willard d. paige

review: better than the Roku that is all I have to say, I have both this performs much better.
author: Tony

review: Relatively weak product.  Interface sluggish, wireless reception touchy, cable ends hard to use with my sharp TV hdmi ports, cheap remote.  I would return it but it will take longer than it is worth to clean off my login data.  Disappointed given good reputation of set top Fire product.
author: Mitchell Rohde

review: it works well but we bought to take camping and use it with my iphone hotspot and unless you get a good signal you don't get a great picture.
author: Michele Green

review: Very easy to set up and use. My kids love the game apps.
author: S. Biddle "sbiddle"
